synopsis.text:
Magic-kyun! Welcome to a world where art transforms into enchanting magic. Here, gifted individuals known as Artistas can inspire passion through their Magic Arts and captivate audiences in the show business. At the prestigious Hoshinomori Private Magical Arts High School, these Artistas hone their skills. Enter Ohana Aigasaki, an unusual new transfer student who finds herself on the planning committee for the school's annual Hoshinomori Summer Festa cultural festival.

As Ohana navigates her romantic high school life, she is joined by six charming boys, each aspiring to become future entertainers and masters of their own unique Arts. Together, they strive to make the Hoshi Fes an unforgettable success. But that's not all - the boys also compete to be selected as the school's Artista Prince, while Ohana vies for the coveted title of Artista Princess. These prestigious titles are bestowed only once a year, adding an exhilarating layer of competition to their magical journey.

Embark on this magical adventure filled with captivating Artistas, each possessing distinct personalities, as they create unforgettable memories and aim for the stars in Magic-kyun! Renaissance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
